name: retailyscom/retailys-sdk-php
description:
Communication API restful e-commerce system Retailys. Get access in system at [https://www.retailys.com](https://www.retailys.com)

Introduction

**Retailys API** allows to create an amazing ecosystem of e-commerce services and help to develop robust webshops and other e-commerce solutions. Thanks to many built-in omnichannel and multichannel principles, every developer has possibility tu use **Retailys API** for creating vast global e-commerce applications easily and effectively.
